what_you_do: Rob Kosberg is a business consultant, #1 bestselling author, publisher, entrepreneur, as well as the Founder of Best Seller Publishing.
who_you_serve: He focuses on helping small business owners develop a systematic lead strategy to build wealth and time freedom using his marketing techniques and services.
social_proof: Kosberg has numerous business ventures from his weekly local financial radio shows to his Christian Business Association, which focuses on helping Christian entrepreneurs, small business owners, and professionals to market their businesses successfully.
business_focus: Helping small businesses reach their target audience via cutting edge marketing.
service_provided: business consulting, publishing, marketing, lead generation
